html:
1.23.21  4:04 pm   Can I have sheet music or chord charts or something for your songs?

      yes, i will see if i can come up with something

1.23.21  4:00 pm   Would you say that making music is therapeutic for you?

      yes

1.23.21  3:06 pm   how do you obtain inspiration  

      from molecules, but not actually the molecules it's the space between the molecules that's the most inspiring, because that's where you get to put your own molecules

1.23.21  3:00 pm   on 1:01 in "might quit", how was the journey for the to letter words like?

      pretty fun. i wrote myself into a nice challenging corner because then i had to come up with some lines that only used 2 letter words

1.23.21  2:59 pm   Are you planning on running for President in 2024?

      no

1.23.21  2:51 pm   in might quit did you put any clues for here comes the sun in any part of the video

      no. it was not known to me that that was going to be the next song

1.23.21  2:42 pm   is there any meaning in "here comes the sun"?

      yes

1.23.21  2:32 pm   1.22.21  2:03 am are you sure it wasn't shift?

      yes, but i use that one too. probably more often

1.23.21  1:59 pm   What was the hardest part of creating here comes the sun besides the song?

      making the video

1.23.21  1:32 pm   How much do you try to steer your artistic identity? 

      none. i let it steer me

1.23.21  1:26 pm   what's a good way to start getting into song writing

      what problems have you had so far? if none, then just go ahead and do it. if you run into problems, then let me know what they are and we can go from there

1.23.21  1:10 pm   Why did you quit YouTube for a year?

      i have never quit youtube

1.23.21  12:52 pm   Thoughts on money?

      it seems to be very valuable

1.23.21  12:11 pm   Are you exited about how far the graphics in Bill Wurtz have come since 2014?

      in early 2019, yes. but unfortunately after that it went back to literally zero. but i'm also excited at how far it's come since 2019 after going back to zero. i'd say it's at a solid 1 out of 10 at this point

1.23.21  12:05 pm   what's your opinion on the continent of antarctica

      kind of like a blank slate

1.23.21  11:17 am   thoughts about star wars

      sometimes i wonder if there will ever be peace, in the stars

1.23.21  11:05 am   How long had here comes the done been done as a song?

     about an hour, before starting the video

     Did you re-record anything before you started working on the video?

     i recorded the whole thing before doing the video

1.23.21  10:40 am   are there still going to be videos with 2d animation?

      yes

1.23.21  10:28 am   how do i go about writing lyrics

      try doing it musically

1.23.21  10:22 am   do you just pick a phrase or a word to be the theme then proceed with the lyric or do you write your song regardless

      sometimes A, always B

1.23.21  10:04 am   Are you tired of people overanalyzing "might quit"?

      no

1.23.21  9:44 am   i understand the desire to work towards the massive backlog of song ideas you've stockpiled for about a decade, but have any of your released songs been written completely right before you made the video?

      yes

1.23.21  9:31 am   what question did damien maymdien skip in maybe i could eat blades of grass?

      this one

1.23.21  9:17 am   I think when there's no words in the human language to describe vague amorphous emotions, I can refer very clearly to your songs, is that ok?

      yes, that is exactly why music is so valuable, and why i use it

1.23.21  9:09 am   I see you play the keyboard/piano I really want to start to learn by my self, is there any sources you recommend? (English isn't my first language so I deeply apologize)

      there are 3 main sources: the keyboard, every song you've ever heard, and your imagination

1.23.21  8:54 am   will you make more song in the future

      yes

1.23.21  8:53 am   is there any sort of story or meaning that connects all/most of your songs? Whether that's in-universe or about making the songs.

     basically, songs can be a powerful magic trick, when done right. so i've pretty much devoted most of my life to discovering the best possible tricks

     Do any of your songs have meaning at all?

     yes

     What's the most absurd lyric you've put in a song that actually has a serious/deep meaning?

      stay strong, and the day goes on

1.23.21  8:52 am   if each day were two hours longer, would that be enough time?

      it would be the same amount of time

1.23.21  7:45 am   how do you right your songs so well?

     after enough years i've eventually been able to throw away most of the wrong ways

     and also how do you animate so smoothly?

      got to go with the flow of time and space, not against it

1.23.21  7:25 am   what time is egg

      all times. egg is forever

1.23.21  6:22 am   are you working on another masterpiece now

      i am working on another regular piece

1.23.21  5:48 am   why did you write VACATIONING IN THE MIDDLE OF THE SUN in the expert page

      because i was flabbergasted at the way my life was going. you'll notice i proclaimed a similar message for 1.15.16, and 1.13.15

1.23.21  5:06 am   Do you have a secret text document that you use to secretly type capital letters into?

      one of my favorite places to type capital letters is in videos i post on my youtube channel, for your viewing enjoyment. Capital letters are especially useful there because they capture your attention, and keep you from closing the video

1.23.21  5:00 am   will there ever be a return of your more advanced  shorts (wfaoie, micebog, soap tips, hi I'm steve)  or maybe your quick bite sized text/voice shorts before history of japan, or maybe even a monthly or something return of monday videos   

      yes, i have an exciting new format that i think should be enjoyable

1.23.21  4:57 am   How to create the universe?

      just be yourself

1.23.21  4:44 am   waffles or pancakes?

      ah, the classic cry of the person who has yet to discover waff cakes

1.23.21  4:40 am   Do you ever think about what your doing 

      yes

1.23.21  4:31 am   How do you explain the theoretical anomaly of Steve's name not being Steve but rather the listener's name, if the listener's name is Steve? It's something to think about.

      theoretical anomalies are something to think about. that's exactly why i try to put them in my videos

1.23.21  4:06 am   Opinions on the solar system?

      it's flat

1.23.21  3:44 am   in "here comes the sun", on the line "looks like nobody wins today", the word "nobody" is in quotes, which implies that there is somebody named nobody who won today. What was the  reason for "nobody" being in quotes?

      just trying to keep my options open

1.23.21  3:32 am   What are your thoughts on cereal?

      it's a good way to test if a bowl works

1.23.21  3:06 am   how do i fix my sleep schedule??

      just try to act naturally

1.23.21  2:09 am   im confused. are you a leopard or a camel? the information in your first few videos is contradicting. mind clearing this up? thanks

      i was testing the video-making process

1.23.21  1:53 am   hey i saw ur answer about making videos weekly and i mean why not just make those short videos where you say a funny thing every week idk

      disney princess voice "there must be more to life than short funny things"

1.23.21  1:04 am   Thoughts on bricks

      they have a certain 'layable' quality to them

1.23.21  1:02 am   What's the page called scarmble for?

     anagrams

     What does scarmble even mean?

     scramble

1.23.21  1:01 am   In general terms using any scale for reference, how much would you say I like your music?

      i have no idea

1.23.21  12:59 am   Did you spend 1 year on making 'here comes the sun'?

      no

1.23.21  12:27 am   what inspires you

      the fabric and fibers of our world today

1.23.21  12:19 am   What was your reaction when your History of japan video blew up?

      this
